pages.text: For creating anything involving turrets, this crafting station is all you need (next to the ingredients, of course). To operate it you need to interact ($(k:use) on the placed down block) with it, opening a UI, which is explained in subsequent pages.

To make it work you need to feed it power. The assembly table accepts RF (Redstone Flux), FE (Forge Energy) and T (Tesla). If you don't have any device powering it, you can always use our $(l:misc/electrolyte_generator)Electrolyte Generator$(/l) next to it.

pages.title: UI (Input Slots)
pages.text: In order to upgrade it or give resources for it to craft with, the UI provides you with input slots. The top 2 rows are the slots from the assembly table, with the 4 outermost slots to the left and right being reserved for upgrades, and the bottom 4 rows are your inventory slots.$(br)A hopper connected to one of the sides of the table can insert items into it.

pages.title: UI (Recipes)
